body.p: Organized at-large from Kentucky recruits. Operations in Kentucky against Confederate General John Hunt Morgan from July 4 to 28, 1862. Action at Battle of Cynthiana July 17, Paris July 19, Mt. Sterling July 29. Fought at Battle of Richmond August 30, 1862. Many captured at Richmond. 1863 occupation of Middle Tennessee. Fought at Battle of Chickamauga September 19-21, 1863. Siege of Chattanooga September 22-November 23, 1863. Siege of Savannah December 1864. Campaign in the Carolinas January to April 1865.

Killed in Action: 5 officers, 85 enlisted men.
Death by Disease: 1 officer, 152 enlisted men.

bibl.p: Frederick Henry Dyer, A Compendium of the War of the Rebellion, (Des Moines: Dyer Publishing Company, 1908), page 1205.
